alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 9:22PM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts up to 12 inches are possible along the higher terrain around Duluth and up the North Shore. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Central St. Louis and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas and Bayfield Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area, the Fond du Lac Band and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
